prompt_engine.description:
üöÄ PROMPT ENGINE [CAGEERF]: Expands prompts with C.A.G.E.E.R.F methodology for you to follow.

WHAT IT RETURNS: Prepared prompt + CAGEERF phase instructions (Context‚ÜíAnalysis‚ÜíGoals‚ÜíExecution‚ÜíEvaluation‚ÜíRefinement).
WHAT YOU DO: Execute each phase yourself using the returned structure.

SYNTAX: >>prompt_id key="value" | Chain: >>s1 --> >>s2
OPERATORS: @CAGEERF | :: "criteria" | %clean/%lean

parameters.command: Prompt ID to expand. Resulting prompt will include CAGEERF phase guidance for you to apply.

prompt_manager.description: üìù PROMPT MANAGER [CAGEERF]: Manages prompt templates. Use action:"guide" for phase-appropriate recommendations (Context research vs. Execution updates).

parameters.action: Use 'guide' with your current CAGEERF phase for phase-appropriate action recommendations.

system_control.description: ‚öôÔ∏è SYSTEM CONTROL [CAGEERF]: System administration. Status shows current CAGEERF phase context.

parameters.action: Use 'guide' with topic:'framework' for phase-specific operation guidance.
